US state and territory data

Source: R/data.R
territory.Rd

state.terr.name and state.terr.abb expand the built-in state.name and state.abb vectors by adding US territories and the District of Columbia. This includes:

  • American Samoa

  • District of Columbia

  • Guam

  • Northern Mariana Islands

  • Puerto Rico

  • Virgin Islands

state.terr.data includes names, abbreviations, and FIPS codes for US states and territories.

Usage

state.terr.name

state.terr.abb

state.terr.data

Format

An object of class character of length 56.

An object of class character of length 56.

An object of class tbl_df (inherits from tbl, data.frame) with 56 rows and 4 columns.

See also

state.name
